title: Hour 3 - Mark Schlereth (01-06-20)

description:
Dan and The Danettes welcome FOX NFL analyst Mark Schlereth. Thank you to today's sponsors: Credible = Consolidate your student loans, visit credible.com/dan for more information.  Geico = Visit Geico.com. In just 15 minutes you could save 15% or more on car insurance.
